Menus and buttons

settings.content: The [Starter plan](https://debutify.com/app/plans/starter)can activate up to 5 add-ons. The [Hustler plan](https://debutify.com/app/plans/hustler)can activate up to 30 add-ons. The [Master plan](https://debutify.com/app/plans/master)can activate all current and future add-ons.

settings.label: Add-to-cart animation
settings.info: Add an animation to the product page add-to-cart button. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054044-how-to-use-add-to-cart-animation-in-3-0)

settings.label: Age check
settings.info: Verifies the age of website visitors before they can access your content and products. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057047-how-to-use-the-age-check-add-on-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Agree to terms
settings.info: Ask customers to agree with your Terms & conditions before checking out. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5242844-how-to-enable-the-agree-to-terms-and-conditions-add-on-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Automatic geolocation
settings.info: Add ability to set default language and currency based on user location. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057013-how-to-use-automatic-geolocation-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Back in stock
settings.info: Allow customers to fill back in stock request form. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5265388-how-to-enable-the-back-in-stock-add-on-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Cart countdown
settings.info: Display a countdown timer in the cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5248732-how-to-enable-the-cart-favicon-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Cart favicon
settings.info: Change the page favicon to a secondary image if there is a product in cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5248732-how-to-enable-the-cart-favicon-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Cart discount
settings.info: Allow customers to enter discount codes in the cart before checkout. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054067-how-to-use-cart-discount-in-3-0)

settings.label: Cart goal
settings.info: Offer free shipping when a specific cart total amount is reached. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054070-how-to-use-cart-goal-in-3-0)

settings.label: Cart savings
settings.info: Display the total amount of savings in the cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5161111-how-to-use-cart-saving-addon-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Cart upsell
settings.info: Add up-sells and cross-sells directly in your cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057083-how-to-use-cart-upsell-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Collection add-to-cart
settings.info: Allow visitors to add products to cart directly from collection pages. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054085-how-to-use-collection-add-to-cart-in-3-0)

settings.label: Collection filters
settings.info: Allow visitors to filter the products on the collection page by the parameters they want. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5290641-how-to-enable-the-collection-filters-add-on-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Color swatches
settings.info: Add color swatches to your product options. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054086-how-to-add-color-swatches-in-3-0)

settings.label: Cookie box
settings.info: Display a cookie box to make your website GDPR compliant. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054095-how-to-use-a-cookie-box-in-3-0)

settings.label: Custom currencies
settings.info: Show prices in multiple currencies without having to use Shopify Payment multi-currency converter. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057090-how-to-use-custom-currencies-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Delivery time
settings.info: Display an approximate date of delivery. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054100-how-to-use-delivery-time-add-on-in-3-0)

settings.label: Discount saved
settings.info: Display the discount amount of on-sale product variants on the product page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054103-how-to-use-discount-saved-add-on-in-3-0)

settings.label: Facebook messenger
settings.info: Add a Facebook Messenger chat widget to your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057679-how-to-add-a-facebook-messenger-chat-widget-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: FAQ
settings.info: Add a searchable question and answers module to your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054110-how-to-display-a-new-f-a-q-page-in-3-0)

settings.label: Infinite scroll
settings.info: Replace paginations with a "Load more" button or by automatically loading items as you scroll down the page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5161154-how-to-use-infinite-scroll-addon-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Inactive tab message
settings.info: Display a different page title when the user goes to another tab. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5242828-how-to-enable-the-inactive-tab-message-add-on-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Instagram feed
settings.info: Display the latest images of your Instagram page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057122-how-to-manage-your-instagram-feed-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Inventory quantity
settings.info: Display the stock level for each product variants. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054133-how-to-display-the-inventory-quantity-of-your-product-variant-in-3-0)

settings.label: Linked options
settings.info: Hide unavailable product variant combinations. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054136-how-to-use-linked-options-in-3-0)

settings.label: Live view
settings.info: Display the number of people viewing your product page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054147-how-to-use-live-view-in-3-0)

settings.label: Mega menu
settings.info: Add nested menus, products, collections, articles and more to your header navigation. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054172-how-to-create-a-mega-menu-in-3-0)

settings.label: Menu bar
settings.info: Add a simple scrollable menu below header. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5231134-how-to-enable-a-menu-bar-add-on-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Newsletter pop-up
settings.info: Display a customizable newsletter pop-up to capture your visitor's email before they leave your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054175-how-to-display-a-newsletter-popup-in-3-0)

settings.label: Order feedback
settings.info: Find out how your customers know about you. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5242840-how-to-enable-the-order-feedback-add-on-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Order tracking
settings.info: Let your customer track their orders directly from within your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057483-how-to-use-order-tracking-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Page builder
settings.info: Add draggable sections to both custom and product pages. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5379763-how-to-use-page-builder-add-on-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Page speed booster
settings.info: Improve your conversion rate by making your store faster. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5227401-how-to-create-a-page-speed-booster-add-on-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Page transition
settings.info: Display a preloader with your logo while the page is loading. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057511-how-to-use-page-transition-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Pricing table
settings.info: Showcase product options, bundles, packages and all other upgrade options in a side-by-side price comparison table. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054183-how-to-create-a-pricing-table-in-3-0)

settings.label: Product bullet points
settings.info: Add short, easily digestible pieces of information about your products. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5227389-how-to-add-product-bullet-points-add-on-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Product image crop
settings.info: Format all your product images into the same ratio. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057531-how-to-use-product-image-crop-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Product tabs
settings.info: Add additional details about your products in customizable tabs. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054187-how-to-create-product-tabs-in-3-0)

settings.label: Quantity breaks
settings.info: Reward customers with discount codes when they purchase multiple items from your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054197-how-to-enable-quantity-break-add-on-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Quick view
settings.info: Let customers quickly view your product details before they visit the product page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054198-how-to-use-quick-view-in-3-0)

settings.label: Recently viewed
settings.info: Display the products a visitor has seen while browsing your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057690-how-to-display-recently-viewed-products-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Sales countdown
settings.info: Add a countdown timer for your on-sale products. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054213-how-to-display-a-sales-countdown-on-your-product-page-in-3-0)

settings.label: Sales pop
settings.info: Showcase your store's recent purchases to all visitors. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057674-how-to-add-sales-pop-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Shop protect
settings.info: Protect your product description, images, articles and other content from being stolen. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054230-how-to-use-shop-protect-in-3-0)

settings.label: Skip cart
settings.info: Skip the shopping cart page and go directly to the checkout page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5290632-how-to-enable-the-skip-cart-add-on-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme  )

settings.label: Size chart
settings.info: Add customizable size guides with tables and images to your product pages. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057686-how-to-add-a-size-chart-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Smart search
settings.info: Show search results immediately as you type into the search field. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054239-how-to-use-smart-search-in-3-0)

settings.label: Social discount
settings.info: Reward customer with a discount code when they share your products on social media. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057551-how-to-use-a-social-discount-add-on-in-debutify-3-0)

settings.label: Sticky add-to-cart
settings.info: Add a sticky add-to-cart bar when scrolling passed the add-to-cart button. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054241-how-to-display-a-sticky-add-to-cart-bar-in-3-0)

settings.label: Synced variant image
settings.info: Variant changes when changing slide in the product gallery. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5227327-how-to-create-a-synced-variant-image-add-on-in-debutify-3-0-shopify-theme)

settings.label: Trust badge
settings.info: Display payments icons or custom trust badge under the add-to-cart and checkout buttons. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054277-how-to-display-a-trust-badge-in-3-0)

settings.label: Upsell bundles
settings.info: Let customers buy different products in one-click by creating bundle offers. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054282-how-to-manage-upsell-bundles-in-3-0)

settings.label: Upsell pop-up
settings.info: Display a customizable upsell pop-up that trigger when adding a product to cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054298-how-to-use-upsell-pop-up-in-3-0)

settings.label: Wish list
settings.info: Let customers add their favorite products to a wish list they can come back to later. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054299-how-to-setup-a-wish-list-addon-in-debutify-3-0)
